title: The Moon-Bog
description: The Moon-Bog is a short story by American horror fiction writer H. P. Lovecraft.The unnamed narrator describes the final fate of his good friend, Denys Barry, an Irish-American who reclaims an ancestral estate in Kilderry, a fictional village in Ireland. Barry ignores pleas from the superstitious local peasantry not to drain the nearby bog, with unfortunate supernatural consequences.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
